mapper.select: select * from members where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw=#{memberPw}
mapper.insert: insert into members(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_add, responsibility, image) values(#{memberId},#{memberPw},#{memberName},#{memberPhone},#{memberAddr},'user',#{image})
mapper.select: select * from members order by member_id
mapper.update: update members set member_name=#{memberName}, member_pw=#{memberPw}, member_phone=#{memberPhone}, member_add=#{memberAddr} WHERE member_id=#{memberId}
